item.title: Generate DDL with hibernate
item.description: I don’t know if it’s a well known feature but there is a bunch of methods on hibernate Configuration class which will produce DDL for your database according to the dialect in use. In this blog post we will see how to use those methods to generate a DDL script to set up our database and get rid of those annoying DBAs (just kidding, always review these scripts, they’re not production ready).
